summary: The diff implements all 7 requirements. Profile picture display (REQ-1) is added to ProfilePage.tsx. Backend data model for battle requests (REQ-2) is added to main.mo. Backend endpoints for creating (REQ-3) and responding to (REQ-4) battle requests are implemented. Frontend battle request dialog (REQ-5) allows team leaders to propose dates. Frontend battle request list (REQ-6) shows incoming requests with accept/reject actions. Scheduled battles list (REQ-7) displays accepted battles on team detail pages. All acceptance criteria appear implemented.
